chapter.text: 25|1|Kata barakatamaya tini [1]! Yini tamra bandara upara phurakana nayila karechena, srstijagatera jan'ya [2] satarkakari ha'oyara jan'ya.

25|2|Yini asamanasamuha o yaminera sarbabhaumatbera adhikari; tini kono santana grahana karenani; sarbabhaumatbe tamra kono sarika ne'i. Tini sabakichu srsti karechena atahpara ta nirdharana karechena yathayatha anupate.

25|3|Ara tara tamra paribarte ilaharupe grahana kareche an'yaderake yara kichu'i srsti kare na, baram tara nijera'i srsta ebam ebam tara nijedera apakara kimba upakara karara ksamata rakhe na. Ara mrtyu, jibana o ut'thanera upara'o kono ksamata rakhe na.
25|4|Ara kapherara bale, ‘eta mithya chara kichu'i naya, se eta ratana kareche ebam bhinna sampradayera loka take e byapare sahayya kareche.’ Sutaram abasya'i kapherara yuluma o mithya niye eseche.
25|5|Tara ara'o bale, ‘egulo to se kalera upakatha, ya se likhiye niyeche; tarapara egulo sakala-sandhya tara kache patha kara haya.’
25|6|Baluna, ‘eta tini'i nayila karechena yini asamanasamuha o yaminera samudaya rahasya janena; niscaya tini parama ksamasila, parama dayalu.’
25|7|Ara'o tara bale, ‘e kemana rasula’ ye kha'oya-da'oya kare ebam hate-bajare calaphera kare; tara kache kono phirisata kena nayila kara hala na, ye tara sange thakata satarkakarirupe?’
25|8|‘Athaba tara kache kono dhanabhandara ese parala na kena athaba tara ekati bagana ne'i kena ya theke se kheto?’ Ara yalimara aro bale, ‘tomara to eka jadugrasta byaktira'i anusarana karacha.’
25|9|Dekhuna, tara apanara ki upama deya! Phale tara pathabhrasta hayeche, sutaram tara patha pete pare na [1].
25|10|Kata barakatamaya tini yini icche karale apanake dite parena era ceye utkrsta bastu---udyanasamuha yara padadese nadi-nala prabahita ebam tini dite parena apanake prasadasamuha
25|11|baram tara kiyamatera upara [1] mithyaropa kareche. Ara ye kiyamate mithyaropa kare tara jan'ya amara prastuta rekhechi jbalanta aguna.
25|12|Dura theke aguna yakhana taderake dekhabe takhana tara sunate pabe era krud'dha garjana o hunkara.
25|13|Ara yakhana taderake galaya hata pemciye srnkhalita abasthaya setara kono sankirna sthane niksepa kara habe, takhana tara sekhane dhbansa kamana karabe.
25|14|Bala habe, aja tomara eka dhbansake deko na, baram bahu dhbansake daka.’
25|15|Baluna, ‘eta'i sreya, na sthayi jannata, yara pratisruti deya hayeche muttakiderake?’ Ta habe tadera pratidana o pratyabartanasthala.
25|16|Sekhane tara cirakala basabasarata abasthaya ya ca'ibe tadera jan'ya ta-i thakabe; e pratisruti purana apanara raba-era'i dayitba.

25|17|Ara sedina tini ekatra karabena taderake ebam tara allah‌ra paribarte yadera ‘ibadata karata taderake, tarapara tini jijnesa karabena, ‘tomara'i ki amara e bandaderake bibhranta karechile, na tara nijera'i bibhraanta hayechila?’

25|18|Tara balabe, ‘pabitra o mahana apani! Apanara paribarte amara an'yake abibhabakarupe grahana karate pari na [1]; apani'i to taderake ebam tadera pitrpurusaderake bhoga-sambhara diyechilena; pariname tara yikara tatha smarana bhule giyechila ebam parinata hayechila eka dhbansaprapta sampradaye [2].

25|19|(Allah‌ musarikaderake balabena) ‘tomara ya balate tara to ta mithya sabyasta kareche. Kaje'i tomara sasti pratirodha karate parabe na ebam sahayya'o pabe na. Ara tomadera madhye ye yulama tatha sirka karabe amara take mahasasti asbadana karaba [1].’

25|20|Ara apanara age amara ye sakala rasula pathiyechi tara sakale'i to kha'oya-da'oya karata o hate-bajare calaphera karata [1] ebam (he manusa!) Amara tomadera eka-ke an'yera jan'ya pariksasbarupa karechi. Tomara dhairya dharana karabe ki? Ara apanara raba to sarbadrasta.

25|21|Ara yara amadera saksatera asa kare na tara bale, ‘amadera kache phirisata nayila kara haya na kena? Athaba amara amadera rabake dekhi na kena?’ Tara to tadera antare ahankara posana kare [1] ebam tara gurutara abadhyataya mete utheche.
25|22|Yedina tara phirisataderake dekhate pabe sedina aparadhidera jan'ya kono susambada thakabe na ebam tara balabe, ‘raksa kara, raksa kara[1].’
25|23|Ara amara tadera krtakarmera prati agrasara haye seguloke biksipta dhulikanaya parinata karaba.
25|24|Sedina jannatabasidera basasthana habe utkrsta ebam bisramasthala habe manorama [1].
25|25|Ara sedina akasa bidirna habe meghapunja dbara [1] ebam dale dale phirisataderake namiye deya habe
25|26|se dina curanta kartrtba habe dayamayera [1] ebam kapheradera jan'ya se dina habe atyanta kathina.
25|27|Yalima [1] byakti sedina nijera du‘hata dansana karate karate balabe, ‘haya, ami yadi rasulera sathe kono patha abalambana karatama [2]
25|28|‘Haya, durbhoga amara, ami yadi amukake bandhurupe grahana na karatama
25|29|‘amake to se bibhranta karechila amara kache upadesa paumchara para.’ Ara sayatana to manusera jan'ya mahaprataraka.
25|30|Ara rasula balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampradaya to e kura'anake parityajya sabyasta kareche.’
25|31|Allah‌ balena, ‘ara ebhabe'i amara pratyeka nabira jan'ya aparadhidera theke satru baniye thaki. Ara apanara raba'i pathapradarsaka o sahayyakarirupe yathesta.’

25|32|Ara kapherara bale, ‘samagra kura'ana tara kache ekabare nayila halo na kena?’ Ebhabe'i amara nayila karechi apanara hrdayake ta dbara mayabuta karara jan'ya ebam ta krame krame spastabhabe abrtti karechi.
25|33|Ara tara apanara kache ye bisaya'i upasthita kare na kena, amara setara sathika samadhana o sundara byakhya apanara kache niye asi.
25|34|Yaderake mukhera upara bhara diye cala abasthaya jahannamera dike ekatra kara habe, tara sthanera dika theke ati nikrsta ebam adhika pathabhrasta.
25|35|Ara amara to musake kitaba diyechilama ebam tara sathe tara bha'i harunake sahayyakari karechilama
25|36|atahpara amara balechilama, ‘tomara se sampradayera kache ya'o yara amara nidarsanabalite mithyaropa kareche [1].’ Tarapara amara taderake sampurnarupe bidhbasta karechilama

25|37|ara nuhera sampradayake'o, yakhana tara rasulaganera prati mithya aropa karala [1] takhana amara taderake dubiye dilama ebam taderake manusera jan'ya nidarsanasbarupa kare rakhalama. Ara yalimadera jan'ya amara yantranadayaka sasti prastuta kare rekhechi.
25|38|Ara amara dhbansa karechilama ‘ada, samuda, ‘ras‌’ [1] -era adhibasike ebam tadera antarbartikalera bahu prajanmake'o
25|39|ara amara tadera pratyekera jan'ya drstanta barnana karechilama ebam tadera sakalake'i amara sampurnarupe dhbansa karechilama.
25|40|Ara tara to se janapada diye'i yatayata kare yara upara barsita hayechila akalyanera brsti, tabe ki tara esaba dekhate paya na [1]? Bastuta tara punarut'thanera asa'i kare na.
25|41|Ara tara yakhana apanake dekhe, takhana tara apanake sudhu thatta-bidrarupera patrarupe ganya kare, bale, ‘e-i ki se, yake allah‌ rasula kare pathiyechena

25|42|‘se to amaderake amadera upasyagana hate dure sariye'i dita, yadi na amara tadera anugatyera upara abicala thakatama.’ Ara yakhana tara sasti pratyaksa karabe, takhana janate parabe ke adhika pathabhrasta.
25|43|Apani ki take dekhechena, ye tara prabrttike ilaharupe grahana kare? Tabu'o ki apani tara yim'madara habena
25|44|naki apani mane karena ye, tadera adhikansa sone athaba bojhe? Tara to pasura mata'i; baram tara ara'o adhika pathabhrasta.
25|45|Apani ki apanara rabera prati laksya karena na [1] kibhabe tini chaya samprasarita karena? Tini icche karale etake to sthira rakhate paratena; tarapara amara suryake karechi era nirdesaka.
25|46|Tarapara amara etake amadera dike dhire dhire gutiye ani.
25|47|Ara tini'i tomadera jan'ya ratake karechena abaranasbarupa, bisramera jan'ya tomadera diyechena nidraa [1] ebam chariye parara jan'ya karechena dina [2].
25|48|Ara tini'i tamra rahamatera brstira age susambadabahirupe bayu prerana karena ebam amara akasa hate pabitra pani barsana kari [1]
25|49|yate ta dbara amara mrta bhu-khandake sanjibita kari ebam amara ya srsti karechi tara madhya hate bahu jibajantu o manusake ta pana kara'i [1]
25|50|ara amara to ta tadera madhye bitarana kari yate tara smarana kare. Atahpara adhikansa loka sudhu akrtajnata'i prakasa kare [1].
25|51|Ara amara icche karale pratiti janapade ekajana satarkakari pathate paratama.
25|52|Kaje'i apani kapheradera anugatya karabena na ebam apani kura'anera sahayye tadera sathe bara jihada caliye yana.
25|53|Ara tini'i du'i sagarake samantarale prabahita karechena, ekati mista, supeya ebam an'yati lona, khara; ara tini ubhayera madhye rekhe diyechena eka antaraya, eka anatikramya byabadhana [1].
25|54|Ara tini'i manusake srsti karechena pani hate; tarapara tini take bansagata o baibahika samparkasila karechena [1]. Ara apanara raba halena prabhuta ksamatabana.
25|55|Ara tara allah‌ra paribarte emana kichura ‘ibadata kare ya tadera upakara karate pare na ebam tadera apakara'o karate pare na. Ara kaphera to tara rabera birodhitaya sahayogitakari.
25|56|Ara amara to apanake sudhu susambadadata o satarkakarirupe'i pathiyechi.
25|57|Baluna, ‘ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono binimaya ca'i na, tabe ye tara rabera dikera patha abalambana karara icche kare.’
25|58|Ara apani nirbhara karuna tamra upara yini ciranjiba, yini marabena na ebam tamra saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna, tini tamra bandadera papa samparke abahita hisebe yathesta.

25|59|Tini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti sabakichu chaya dine srsti karena; tarapara tini ‘arasera upara uthalena. Tini'i ‘rahamana’, sutaram tamra sambandhe ye abahita take jijnesa kare dekhuna.

25|60|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘sajadabanata ha'o ‘rahamana’ -era prati,’ takhana tara bale, ‘rahamana abara ki [1]? Tumi ka'uke sajada karate balale'i ki amara take sajada karaba?’ Ara ete tadera palayanaparata'i brd'dhi paya.
25|61|Kata barakatamaya tini yini nabhomandale srsti karechena bisala tarakapunja ebam tate sthapana karechena pradipa [1] o alo bikiranakari camda.
25|62|Ara tini'i karechena rata o dinake parasparera anugamirupe tara jan'ya--- ye upadesa grahana karate ba krtajna hate caya.
25|63|Ara ‘rahamana’ -era banda tara'i, yara yamine atyanta binamrabhabe calaphera kare [1] ebam yakhana jahela byaktira taderake (asalina bhasaya) sambodhana kare, takhana tara bale, ‘salama’ [2]
25|64|ebam tara rata atibahita kare tadera rabera uddesye sijadabanata haye o damriye theke [1]
25|65|ebam tara bale, he amadera raba! Apani amadera theke jahannamera sasti hatiye dina, tara sasti to abicchinna.
25|66|Niscaya seta basabasa o abasthanasthala hisebe khuba nikrsta.
25|67|Ebam yakhana tara byaya kare takhana apabyaya kare na, krpanata'o kare na, ara tadera pantha haya etadubhayera madhyabarti [1].

25|68|Ebam tara allah‌ra sathe kono ilahake dake na [1]. Ara allah‌ yara hatya nisedha karechena, yathartha karana chara take hatya kare na [2]. Ara tara byabhicara kare na [3]; ye egulo kare, se sasti bhoga karabe.
25|69|Kiyamatera dina tara sasti bardhitabhabe pradana kara habe ebam sekhane se sthayi habe hina abasthaya
25|70|tabe ye ta'oba kare, imana ane o satkaja kare, phale allah‌ tadera gunahasamuha neka dbara paribartana kare debena. Ara allah‌ ksamasila, parama dayalu.
25|71|Ara ye ta'oba kare o satkaja kare, se to sampurnarupe allah‌ra abhimukhi haya.
25|72|Ara yara mithyara saksya haya na ebam asara karyakalapera sam'mukhina hale apana maryada raksarthe ta parihara kare cale [1].
25|73|Ebam yara tadera rabera ayatasamuha smarana kariye dile tara upara andha ebam badhirera mata pare thake na [1].

25|74|Ebam yara prarthana kare bale, ‘he amadera raba! Amadera jan'ya emana stri o santana-santati dana karuna yara habe amadera jan'ya cokhajurano. Ara apani amaderake karuna muttakidera jan'ya anusaranayogya.
25|75|Tara'i, yaderake pratidana hisebe deya habe jannatera su'ucca kaksa [1] yehetu tara chila dhairyasila. Ara tara prapta habe sekhane abhibadana o salama.
25|76|Sekhane tara sthayi habe. Abasthanasthala o basasthana hisebe ta kata utkrsta
25|77|baluna, ‘amara raba tomadera mote'i bhraksepa karena na, yadi na tomara take daka [1]. Atahpara tomara mithyaropa karecha, sutaram acire'i apariharya habe sasti.’
